name: Ext_R5_AdverseEvent_su_ca_author
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.author for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.author from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdverseEvent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Author of the information on the possible cause of the event
element.definition: The author of the information on the possible cause of the event.
element.comment: `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.author` maps to R4B `AdverseEvent.suspectEntity.causality.author`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Patient)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Author of the information on the possible cause of the event
